class_notes: Music Majors: Counts as a Cat. A.
course_description: Offers a detailed historical examination of Western classical music from 1600 through 1750, emphasizing both repertoire and the cultural practice of music-making. Assignments include midterm and final exams and one research paper.
prerequisites: MUS 200 or MUS_OX 200 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2320, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: S. Crist, Status: Open
